product.title: Frosted Flakes Breakfast Cereal - 24oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Kellogg's Frosted Flakes Corn Cereal is the classic breakfast that kids and adults know and love. Made with crunchy corn flakes with a coating of sweet frosting, this frosted cereal is a delicious breakfast food and a tasty and quick snack for kids. Offered in a 24-ounce family size cereal box, this corn cereal conveniently provides about 17 servings, with 140 calories per serving. Kellogg's Frosted Flakes cereal includes wholesome vitamins and minerals, and the frosted goodness of this Kellogg's cereal is great every time.

top_reviews.title: Bought for Food Pantry
top_reviews.review_text: Nice, Fast delivery! Thank you!

top_reviews.title: They’re Grreat!
top_reviews.review_text: Frosted Flakes are a staple in our house. Light, crispy delicious flakes with just enough sweet goodness to satisfy.

top_reviews.title: Tastes great.
top_reviews.review_text: Tastes great even when milk soggy. Not too sweet, just right amount of sweetness. The corn flakes hold up well in milk. Best eaten with very cold milk.

product.title: Lucky Charms Breakfast Cereal - 19.3oz - General Mills
product.description: All you need to start your day off right is a little bit of magic, and lucky for you, Lucky Charms marshmallows are pretty magical! Hearts, stars, and horseshoes, clovers and blue moons, unicorns, rainbows, and tasty red balloons all make Lucky Charms magically delicious! If you ever wished you could enjoy magically delicious marshmallow charms with fruity goodness, this is your lucky day! Magically delicious Lucky Charms cereal features frosted oats and colored marshmallows. Made with 11g of whole grain per Serving; And it's gluten free!

top_reviews.review_text: Great taste and value
Gluten free and always yummy!
These are the best marshmallows around. I like that they're are a little crunchy. Yum. I throw the cereal part away.

product.title: Raisin Bran Breakfast Cereal - 24oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Kellogg's Raisin Bran is a tasty and high fiber cereal you can feel good about. Get a sunny start to your day with a satisfying breakfast of crispy whole wheat bran flakes and plump raisins. This Kellogg's cereal is offered in a 24-ounce Kellogg's family size cereal box and conveniently provides about 11 servings. Made from North American wheat, this breakfast cereal includes 26% of the daily value of fiber per serving, with eight key nutrients. Enjoy the classic, delicious balance of crunchy, wheat bran flakes with delectably raisins.

top_reviews.title: Love this Cereal
top_reviews.review_text: My Mom and I both love this Raisin Bran Cereal. We have been enjoying it for more than 4 years now. It's our only cereal we buy now.

top_reviews.title: Lots of raisins
top_reviews.review_text: Makes a great snack without milk or with cold milk

top_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy
top_reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying Raisin Bran for many years. Sometimes I have it for breakfast and somtimesci just have it for a snack.

product.title: Raisin Nut Bran Breakfast Cereal 20.8oz - General Mills
product.description: With 38g of whole grain per serving (at least 48g recommended daily) and an excellent source of your daily value of fiber, Fiber One Raisin Nut Bran cereal is the tasty way to fiber. Made with no added sugar and delicious lightly sweetened flakes makes this the perfect way to start off your day!

top_reviews.title: Husband's favorite cereal
top_reviews.review_text: My husband loves this cold cereal. He had been eating it for years and Target has the best price for it locally.

top_reviews.title: Nuts for Raisin Nut Bran!
top_reviews.review_text: We love this cereal. It feels like a fancy raisin bran. The raisins are coated, the flakes are crisp, and the slivers of almonds give an additional texture that is welcome. This is also a nice snack at bedtime.

product.title: All-Bran Breakfast Cereal - 18.6oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Kellogg's All Bran is made with wheat bran, this healthy cereal is crunchy and sweet, with 120 calories per serving. Introduce any of the All Bran Cereals into your breakfast lineup alongside options like a glass of milk and fresh fruit. However, Kellogg's All Bran Cereal isn't limited to breakfast and can be a great base in your next dessert. This 18.6-ounce box makes sure there's plenty to go around with about 13 servings of this high fiber cereal.

top_reviews.title: Convenient Fiber!
top_reviews.review_text: Very quick and easy way to get a significant source of fiber! From my experience, don’t eat a whole serving at once the first time, or your intestines might let you know about it! Slowly incorporate it into your current cereal or add small amounts to yogurt or as an oatmeal topping. Then work your way up to a full serving! It would be great with some dried cranberries or golden raisins mixed in! One not-so-great aspect is that it quickly soaks up all of your milk, so wait until the very last minute to add your milk before digging in!

top_reviews.title: Great Source of Fiber
top_reviews.review_text: I have incorporated this cereal in my diet and I was absolutely astounded by the results. It takes about two days after consuming several bowls to have consistent bowel movements. For a cereal without sugar coated raisins I find the taste pleasant. Better alternative than taking laxatives and is certainly more healthy. My GI doctor would be proud of me

top_reviews.title: Really great stuff.
top_reviews.review_text: I bought it the first time to make bran muffins I had some left over so I decided to try it for breakfast. I loved it and It is filling, I didnt get that hungry feeling after my usual cereal!!

soft_bullets.title: highlights

product.title: Apple Cinnamon Cheerios Breakfast Cereal - 20.1oz - General Mills
product.description: Apple Cinnamon Cheerios breakfast cereal flavors the whole grain goodness of Cheerios with apple puree and a daring amount of cinnamon for a special way to start your family's day. Made with 100% whole grain oats and 12 essential vitamins and minerals, enjoy every bite of this wholesome gluten-free cereal. Each serving of these little O's contains 1 gram of soluble fiber, which may reduce the risk of heart disease when paired with a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol. Pour yourself a bowl of this apple cinnamon cereal, or take it to-go for a fun kids' snack. Either way, it's hard to beat the amazing combination of apple and cinnamon.

top_reviews.title: Cheerios not just for breakfast!
top_reviews.review_text: Best Cheerio flavor ever!!! Love these...and they are GREAT on vanilla ice cream. Really try it!!!

top_reviews.title: Family Favorite
top_reviews.review_text: Family favorite for sure! Great taste. Easy breakfast, snack whatever!
Great product with great taste. A staple in my home

product.title: Apple Jack's Breakfast Cereal - 19.4oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Kellogg's Apple Jacks is a classic family favorite, bringing the sweet taste of apple and cinnamon to breakfast tables for over 50 years. Featuring crunchy sweetened O's, this three grain cereal brings the flavor of crisp apples and delicious cinnamon into each and every bite. This breakfast cereal also makes a great afternoon snack or late night treat for all ages. Each 19.4-ounce family size cereal box has about 14 servings, to keep any household satisfied. Apple Jacks include 150 calories per serving for a wholesome choice.

top_reviews.title: Has always been my favorite.
top_reviews.review_text: I’ve always lived the taste of Apple Jacks, it’s been my favorite since I was a child. Keep up the good work ya’ll, stay safe.

product.title: Basic 4 Breakfast Cereal 19.8oz - General Mills
product.description: Basic 4 multigrain cereal with Fruit and Almonds is the simple and satisfying breakfast cereal to help you start your day strong. Made with  hearty flakes and four components: sweet fruit, coated vanilla clusters, crunchy almonds and crispy rice puffs. It's Basically delicious! And now there's more to love, with 20% more cereal in every box!

top_reviews.title: Best Healthy Cereal Out There!
top_reviews.review_text: Scrumptious, healthy cereal with a perfect blend of whole grain crunchy flakes, sliced almonds, and fruit. Plus you get a sweet surprise of vanilla clusters every once in awhile. It's packed with 5 grams per cup of dietary fiber, which is difficult to find in cereal! There is no high fructose corn syrup, no cholesterol, and it's low in fat. It's a great source of Calcium, and Vitamin D (which you need here in upstate NY due to the lack of sunshine). I eat it with soymilk and on occasion, I will throw in a dash or two of cinnamon and stir. Delicious! I feel energized after eating it, instead of that sluggish feeling you get when you eat something that's not good for you. I was worried when I couldn't find it in the store for awhile, but I think that's because they changed from a 16oz box to a 19.8. So happy they didn't discontinue it! Thank you, General Mills!

top_reviews.title: This cereal rules
top_reviews.review_text: This is the best cereal! Loved it as a kid, stocking up now because why the hell not.

top_reviews.title: Delicious cereal
top_reviews.review_text: Delicious. Great as a traditional cereal. Also a great topping for yogurt, fruits, ice cream. A nice snack too. It's the one cereal everyone in the house agrees on.

product.title: Corn Pops Breakfast Cereal - 10oz - Kellogg's
product.description: A sweet, crispy, crunchy way to start your day, Kellogg’s Corn Pops breakfast cereal makes for a light and delicious cold breakfast any day of the week. Corn Pops is an excellent source of 7 vitamins and minerals and is made with no high fructose corn syrup. Not just for breakfast, Kellogg's Corn Pops is a tasty addition to any meal or snack any time of the day. This cereal has a crisp texture for terrific snacking on straight from the box. Pack some in a plastic bag for the road; this cereal makes a playful addition to your lunch, afternoon pick-me-up, post-workout treat, or indulgent late-night snack. Kellogg's Corn Pops also makes a scrumptious addition to homemade trail mix or as a well-deserved snack at the office - the delicious options are endless. Just add your favorite dairy or nut-milk or enjoy as a crispy treat straight from the box. No matter where it fits in, you'll love the delectable crunch of Kellogg's Corn Pops breakfast cereal.

top_reviews.title: Perfect crunch
top_reviews.review_text: Pops have always been my favorite cereal, they are crunch any don’t get soggy too quick and aren’t overpoweringly sugary

top_reviews.title: Excellent
top_reviews.review_text: Always fresh. Does not get crushed in the mail.

top_reviews.title: Must Buy
top_reviews.review_text: My kids and I love this cereal. We eat this during breakfast and snacks. I like the taste of it and is not too sweet.

product.title: Original Frosted Mini-Wheats Breakfast Cereal - 18oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Greet the day with Kellogg's Original Frosted Mini-Wheats - a wholesome, low fat breakfast cereal that's built for big days. These bite-size biscuits pack a hearty crunch with crispy layers of wheat made from 100% whole grain that are frosted with irresistible sweetness in every bite. With 48 grams of whole grain per 60 gram serving, these tasty squares are not only delicious but are an excellent source of fiber. Each satisfying serving contains a good source of 7 vitamins and minerals to help fuel you for what's ahead. Kellogg's Frosted Mini-Wheats make a nutritious, anytime meal or snack. Enjoy wheat bites throughout the day - as a well-deserved snack at the office, an afternoon pick-me-up, a post-workout treat, or a late-night bowlful of sweet, crunchy cereal. Frosted Mini-Wheats also make a scrumptious addition to homemade trail mix. A travel-ready food, this cereal is perfect to pack for lunchboxes, after-school snacks, sporting events, and busy, on-the-go moments. Kellogg's Original Frosted Mini-Wheats are a great start to your morning breakfast routine and for the adventures that follow.

top_reviews.title: Childhood to Adulthood favorite
top_reviews.review_text: I have loved Frosted mini wheats for as long as I can remember. There is no other cereal on the market that can keep you feeling full longer than this cereal. I love to pour them in a bowl, pour on some milk, then I make some toast with butter before I sit down to eat. I love to let them soak up the milk and get soggy first.

top_reviews.title: Best Breakfast Ever
top_reviews.review_text: I eat this every morning with Blueberries, Yum-yum!!

top_reviews.title: Delicious and good for you!
top_reviews.review_text: Who would believe something so delicious could be so good for you! Crunchy and sweet. My breakfast every morning is a bowl of Kellogg's Frosted Mini Wheats with almond milk and then I'm not hungry until lunch!

This sweet breakfast treat is the cereal kids love and adults can appreciate for its gluten free formula. It's both a breakfast cereal and a snack to be enjoyed by the handful. Fruity PEBBLES breakfast cereal's delicious taste has been a family favorite for over 40 years. Grab a spoon, dig in, and taste the fruity fun.

top_reviews.title: Works Well
top_reviews.review_text: It's cereal. Just pour it in a bowl, add an optional dash of milk, put it in your mouth and eat it. Can't go wrong with that recipe. Fruity and Chocolate Pebbles are especially good because the cereal grains are smaller. They soak up milk more quickly, which in turn makes them softer and less likely to stab your mouth with dryness. My favorite type of cereal.

product.title: Corn Flakes Breakfast Cereal - 18oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Greet your morning with Kellogg’s Corn Flakes Cereal, a healthy and delicious breakfast cereal that’s simple inside to help you start the day off right. Kellogg's Corn Flakes is a classic, family-favorite cereal that's perfect for both kids and adults and made to enjoy by the bowlful. Each serving contains a good source of 8 essential vitamins and minerals. This cereal is cholesterol free, fat free, and does not contain artificial colors or flavors (0g monounsaturated fat; 0g polyunsaturated fat). You can use these flakes to prepare numerous sweet and savory dishes; Kellogg's Corn Flakes can be incorporated into casseroles whole, crushed for a tasty breading on chicken, or added to a yogurt parfait for added crunch. Just add your favorite dairy or nut-milk or enjoy as a crispy treat straight from the box. Fill a baggie with Kellogg’s Corn Flakes for lunchboxes, after-school snacks, and busy, on-the-go moments. Kellogg’s Corn Flakes, the Original and Best.

top_reviews.title: My favorite cereal, great snack as well
top_reviews.review_text: I honestly love this cereal because of the fact it’s so plain and it’s perfect for when I crave carbs. Does have a slight flavor but it’s so delicious. I can eat so much of this cereal!
A healthy option for a quick and easy breakfast with no very little sugar content

top_reviews.title: Still my number 1 Cereal
top_reviews.review_text: I love Kellogg's Corn Flakes because you can monitor the sugar and you can add any kind of fruit.

bullet_description: Contains: Does Not Contain Any of the 8 Major Allergens

soft_bullets.title: highlights
bullets: Kellogg’s Corn Flakes are a crispy, golden way to start your day; Made with a simple recipe, every bite is as delicious as the first
A classic, family-favorite cereal that's perfect for both kids and adults; Enjoy by the bowlful, with yogurt and fruit, or as the base for your favorite desserts and savory dishes
Good source of 8 vitamins and minerals; Cholesterol and fat free (0g monounsaturated fat; 0g polyunsaturated fat); Kosher Pareve
Made with no artificial colors or flavors; A travel-ready food; Pack some cereal in your lunch box for a crispy treat, or stow some in your tote bag, car, and desk for anytime snacking
Includes 1, 18-ounce box of ready-to-eat Corn Flakes Cereal; Packaged for freshness and great taste

product.title: Cracklin' Oat Bran Breakfast Cereal - 16.5oz - Kellogg's
product.description: Kellogg's Cracklin Oat Bran is a crunchy, sweet, oven baked oat cereal. Each delicious bite blends the flavors of golden oats, sugar, coconut flakes, a splash of vanilla flavoring and a dusting of ground cinnamon and nutmeg, making this oat cereal a great breakfast food and a tasty snack straight out of the box. Each box holds about eight servings, so it’s a great addition to your rotation of cereals. With whole grain oats as the first ingredient, this cinnamon cereal is a high fiber choice to get your morning started right. Rekindle the joy of delicious cereal with Kellogg's Cracklin Oat Bran.

top_reviews.title: Best cereal with or without milk!
top_reviews.review_text: Great cereal! best with or without milk.

top_reviews.title: Yummy fiber cereal
top_reviews.review_text: Great as a snack, crumbled on yogurt or like an ordinary cereal...but the taste is not ordinary. The mix of oats, sweetness, hint of coconut...its like a mini crunchy oatmeal cookie bite YUM. I bought it because I wanted my daughter to get that bit of extra fiber and it has really helped her.

top_reviews.title: Dog food
top_reviews.review_text: Now that’s some good ish. What’s not to like? Sugary? Check. Cinnamony? Check. In the shape of food made for dogs? Check. Just pour it in a bowl, put some milk on it, and lap that stuff up like it’s your wedding night.

soft_bullets.title: highlights
bullets: One 16.5-ounce box of Kellogg's Cracklin Oat Bran Cereal
Crunchy, sweet, oven baked oat cereal with flavors of coconut, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg
Contains whole grain oats as first ingredient, making this breakfast cereal a high fiber choice
Delicious breakfast food for anyone who enjoys cinnamon cereal
Box of crunchy cereal is the ideal size for storing in pantries and cabinets
